title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Derek Carr, Luka Among Leagues Best, Tristan Thompson, Eric Mangini
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Derek Carr, Luka Among Leagues Best, Tristan Thompson, Eric Mangini
description:
Derek Carr deserves more credit then he gets, the Raiders are bringing down his brand. Tristan Thompson joins to talk NBA Bubble and whether or not Luka will considered among the leagues best. Eric Mangini also joins the show to talk about the upcoming NFL season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
